name: Agent Bob
description:
This game was made to test playing html5 games on Xbox one

I made this with construct2 free edition so i didn't get to put things i wanted to put in like multiplayer.

You can play this on xbox one using microsoft edge

Controls: W,A,D or arrows and spacebar

Gamepad: L_analogStick,A,RightTrigger

Music By Eric Skiff
